images.description: My favourite TV show ever.  In the 2020 lockdown i started to rewatch it.  it is still amazing!!!!
I was born in Poole, England on the 12 November, 1975
I became an Australian citizen in approximately 2005.  I need to ask mum the exact year
One of my favourite shows when it was on.  Totally in love with Lana.... I have just started rewatching it (as of July 2020
David Bowie.  Another one of my favourite artists.  I have seen him live 3 times on the Reality tour.  Twice in Melbourne and once in Perth.
Queen - my favourite band.  Although, I am not a big fan of things after Freddie....
A very young Buffy. Maybe 12 weeks old?
Buffy, my dog, and me. Buffy is about 6 months of age here.
Yes, I was quite the Queen fan....

I met Brian May from Queen in 1998 at the Perth Airport.  I was also the first person to arrive for his Solo concert at the Metropolis Nightclub.  Might still be my favourite live show.  I guess it was that time in my life.
